text.__SUMMARY__: Gymnopilus earlei is a species of mushroom in the Cortinariaceae family.
text.Description:
The cap is 3 to 10 centimetres (1.2 to 3.9 in) in diameter.
Microscopic characteristics
text.Habitat and distribution: Gymnopilus earlei has been found on coconut logs in Jamaica, during October to November.
